4.text:
visuals = widget.visuals
ctx = visuals.ctx
config = visuals.config

3.text:
roundedRect(
    ctx,
    cleft,
    ctop,
    cwidth,
    context.scrollHeight,
    cradius
)

13.text:
visuals.verticalScrollBar = {
    elType: id,
    primId: id,
    barToBox: context.barToBox,
    box: createBox(
        cleft - context.margin,
        ctop,
        cwidth + context.margin * 2,
        context.scrollHeight
    )
}
